0P00000O6Y.F.summary:
The fund aims to outperform the DOW JONES EURO STOXX MID PRICE index over the recommended investment period as a priority.
 The fund will adopt a 'value' investment strategy which involves:
 - on the basis of rigorous analysis for companies using qualitative and quantitative criteria, selecting shares deemed to be undervalued by the market.
 - and, detecting 'catalyses' (e.g. restructurings, asset disposals ) that make it possible to anticipate a rise in the quoted market price compared to the industrial equity of the company.
